successes.title: Nomiku: bring sous vide into your kitchen.
successes.description: Don't salivate in vain at the delicious food your favorite chefs make. Nomiku cooks sous vide at a very precise temperature.

Pledges.description: Dr. Abe Fetterman, co-founder, will answer one physics question. He has a physics degree from CalTech and a Ph.D in Astrophysics from Princeton University with a focus in Plasma Physics.
A digital copy of our sous vide primer filled with best practices and great recipes. Plus a hearty THANK YOU on our website.
A Nomiku sous vide primer booklet filled with best practices and great recipes. Also, a set of kitchen-proof recipe cards for sous vide cooking. Plus a hearty THANK YOU on our website.
One ticket to a Nomiku pop-up sous vide party in Manhattan, Chicago, or San Francisco. Sous vide goodness will be served.
Two tickets to a Nomiku pop-up sous vide party in Manhattan, Chicago, or San Francisco. Sous vide goodness will be served.
THIS IS IT: a limited edition Kickstarter supporter green Nomiku and digital access to the Nomiku sous vide primer.
International shipping takes place March '13. Please add $20 for shipping and handling if outside the United States.

SAN FRANCISCO CLASS AND ONE NOMIKU:  a three hour sous vide cooking class with co-founder Chef Bam Suppipat in San Francisco. Also, two tickets to our San Francisco Nomiku pop-up sous vide party. Sous vide goodness will be served.

CHICAGO CLASS AND ONE NOMIKU: a three hour sous vide cooking class with co-founder Chef Bam Suppipat in Chicago. Also, two tickets to our Chicago Nomiku pop-up sous vide party. Sous vide goodness will be served.

NEW YORK CLASS AND ONE NOMIKU: a three hour sous vide cooking class with co-founder Chef Bam Suppipat in Manhattan. Also, two tickets to our New York Nomiku pop-up sous vide party. Sous vide goodness will be served.

TWO NOMIKUS! + Digital access to primer.
This offer is for the consummate entertainer and innovator who knows they'll need more than one. Please add $20 for international delivery. Nomiku comes out in the United States December '12 and internationally March '13.
CULINARY SCHOOL PACKAGE: four Nomikus with digital access to the Nomiku sous vide primer! It's perfect for professional food creatives who are bootstrapping.
